mapper.sql: ID, BAD_BEHAVIOR, IS_DELETE, IS_STATUS, CREATE_AT, UPDATE_AT, SCORE
mapper.select:
select
from T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_CREDIBLE where 1=1 AND IS_DELETE != 2
AND BAD_BEHAVIOR like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{badBehavior}), '%')
AND IS_STATUS = #{isStatus}
ORDER BY CREATE_AT DESC
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_CREDIBLE (ID, BAD_BEHAVIOR, IS_DELETE, IS_STATUS, CREATE_AT, UPDATE_AT, SCORE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{badBehavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_CREDIBLE
ID,
BAD_BEHAVIOR,
IS_DELETE,
IS_STATUS,
CREATE_AT,
UPDATE_AT,
SCORE,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{badBehavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_CREDIBLE
BAD_BEHAVIOR = #{badBehavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_STATUS = #{isStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_AT = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_CREDIBLE set BAD_BEHAVIOR = #{badBehavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_STATUS = #{isStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_AT = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
